column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////this place is AMAZING. We were in Chicago for three days and we went once on a Friday and again on a Saturday. On Friday
column2: we got there at around 6 and the wait was 15 minutes. On Saturday
column3: we got there at 4 and the wait was an hour. The pizza is so good but the cookie and ice cream dessert was my favorite part. Hands down the best ice cream I've ever had. When we went on Saturday
column4: the cooks didn't make the dessert at the same time as our appetizers like we asked
column5: so the manager gave us the desserts on the house. The food is great
column7: and it's in a good location.
